title: BOOST! Watch Face Collection
summary: Smart. Bold. Boosted! Unique collection of customizable interactive watch faces.

descriptionHTML:
BOOST! is the collection of fine-crafted watch faces specially made for Android Wear smartwatches. Choose from 30+ of exclusive animated and interactive watch faces - both free and premium designs.

All of our watch faces are perfectly optimized (ensuring low energy consumption) and constantly updated with new features, making sure that you always have the best right at your fingertips. Join the community of 10.000+ fans – try, customize and win watch faces.

🌟Main features:
• All our exclusive, fine-crafted watch faces at one place;
• Preview and try designs before installing;
• 10+ free watch faces available;
• Tweak and personalize options, features & ambient modes;
• All modern functional complications including:
- Weather
- Timer
- Stopwatch
- Moon phase
- Shortcuts
- Widgets
- Gyroscope
- and more...
• Additional animations in most of the watch faces;
• Regular giveaways and upcoming designs showcase;
• Excellent support.

⌚Is it for me?
BOOST! Watch Face Collection is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both for round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected;
✔ Other Android Wear 1.x and 2.0 smartwatches.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, S2 & S3 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions
comments: Nice faces. Clean and elegant and creative
